text: Tangada di langi ga dahi aga ono lima gi di langi, gaa hai dana helekai hagamodu i di ingoo di God dela e noho beelaa gi muli. Au ga hagalongo gi mee e helekai, “E waalooloo nia ngadau e dolu mo di baahi. Di hagaduadua o nia daangada o God ma gaa lawa, gei nia mee huogodoo aanei la guu lawa di hai.”12.7 Hagagida 10.5; 12.14
